catalog_info.title: Decision Making and Negotiation
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: SLS 20 and PSY 15. May not be taken by students who have taken PSY 2650.
catalog_info.description: Decision-Making and NegotiationPeople make decisions and negotiate with others from a young age; however, most know little about the strategy and the psychology that lie beneath these sophisticated behaviors. This class is designed to look ‘under the hood’ at the cognitive processes at play when we make decisions and negotiate with others. We will discuss original research articles and use simulated class exercises to gain a better understanding of how the human mind makes choices and persuades others.
